repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:latest

MAINTAINER Marcelo Gon√ßalves <marcelocg@gmail.com>

# Elixir requires UTF-8
RUN apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends locales && locale-gen en_US.UTF-8 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ENV LANG en_US.UTF-8
ENV LANGUAGE en_US:en
ENV LC_ALL en_US.UTF-8

# update and install software
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y curl wget git make sudo \
    # download and install Erlang apt repo package
    && wget https://packages.erlang-solutions.com/erlang-solutions_1.0_all.deb \
    && dpkg -i erlang-solutions_1.0_all.deb \
    && apt-get update \
    && rm erlang-solutions_1.0_all.deb \
    # For some reason, installing Elixir tries to remove this file
    # and if it doesn't exist, Elixir won't install. So, we create it.
    # Thanks Daniel Berkompas for this tip.
    # http://blog.danielberkompas.com
    && touch /etc/init.d/couchdb \
    # install latest elixir package
    && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y elixir erlang-dev erlang-dialyzer erlang-parsetools \
    # clean up after ourselves
    && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# install the Phoenix Mix archive
RUN mix archive.install --force https://github.com/phoenixframework/archives/raw/master/phx_new.ez
RUN mix local.hex --force \
    && mix local.rebar --force

# install Node.js (>= 8.0.0) and NPM in order to satisfy brunch.io dependencies
# See https://hexdocs.pm/phoenix/installation.html#node-js-5-0-0
RUN curl -f -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y inotify-tools nodejs && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /code
